title: When I restart my phone, Flip to Shhh automatically turns on. How do I fix this?
content:
When I restart my phone, Flip to Shhh automatically turns on. I have turned the rule off, I have tried to delete the rule, but every time I restart my phone, the rule is recreated and turned back on. I'm missing calls; out of habit, I always flip my phone in the screen down position, and that's why I turned this feature off. 

Android Version 9
Build PQ1A.190105.004
